scripts.build:local: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false REACT_APP_USE_TIME_MACHINE_COOKIE=true DEV_URL_OVERRIDE=http://localhost:3004 ASSETS_PATH=/headerstatic LOG_LEVEL=warn node scripts/build.js
scripts.test:integration: cross-env USE_LOCAL_STATIC_CONTENT=false DEV_URL_OVERRIDE=http://localhost:3333 REACT_APP_API_BASEURL=http://localhost:3020 REACT_APP_USE_TIME_MACHINE_COOKIE=true REACT_APP_GEOLOCATION_BASEURL=http://localhost:3020 NODE_ENV=production START_SERVER_AND_TEST_INSECURE=1 npm-run-all -p -r stub-header-api cypress:integration
scripts.test:parallel: cross-env USE_LOCAL_STATIC_CONTENT=false DEV_URL_OVERRIDE=http://localhost:3333 REACT_APP_API_BASEURL=http://localhost:3020 REACT_APP_USE_TIME_MACHINE_COOKIE=true REACT_APP_GEOLOCATION_BASEURL=http://localhost:3020 NODE_ENV=production START_SERVER_AND_TEST_INSECURE=1 npm-run-all -p -r stub-header-api cypress:parallel
scripts.cypress:parallel: start-server-and-test start:container http://localhost:3333/headercontainer  "cypress run --config video=false --record --key #{CYPRESS_RECORD_KEY}# --parallel --ci-build-id #{Build.BuildNumber}# --group 'Azure CI' "
scripts.test:integration:interactive: npm run build:local && cross-env DEV_URL_OVERRIDE=http://localhost:3333 REACT_APP_API_BASEURL=http://localhost:3020 REACT_APP_USE_TIME_MACHINE_COOKIE=true REACT_APP_GEOLOCATION_BASEURL=http://localhost:3020 NODE_ENV=production START_SERVER_AND_TEST_INSECURE=1 npm-run-all -p stub-header-api cypress:interactive
scripts.dev:headless: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider REACT_APP_USE_TIME_MACHINE_COOKIE=true REACT_APP_GEOLOCATION_BASEURL=http://localhost:3020 REACT_APP_API_BASEURL=http://localhost:3020 LOG_LEVEL=warn npm-run-all -p stub-header-api dev
scripts.dev:headless:dev: cross-env REACT_APP_SERVE_PATH_PREFIX=/dev01 ASSETS_PATH=/dev01/headerstatic REACT_APP_USE_TIME_MACHINE_COOKIE=true REACT_APP_GEOLOCATION_BASEURL=http://localhost:3020 REACT_APP_API_BASEURL=http://localhost:3020 LOG_LEVEL=warn npm-run-all -p stub-header-api dev
scripts.dev:headless:container: cross-env REACT_APP_USE_TIME_MACHINE_COOKIE=true REACT_APP_GEOLOCATION_BASEURL=http://localhost:3020 REACT_APP_API_BASEURL=http://localhost:3020 LOG_LEVEL=warn npm-run-all -p stub-header-api container dev
scripts.start:headless:ie: cross-env DEV_URL_OVERRIDE=http://localhost:3004 IE=localhost NODE_ENV=production REACT_APP_API_BASEURL=http://localhost:3020 npm-run-all -p stub-header-api start
scripts.start:headless: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider DEV_URL_OVERRIDE=http://localhost:3004 USEDEVESI=1 NODE_ENV=production ASSETS_PATH=/headerstatic REACT_APP_API_BASEURL=http://localhost:3020 npm-run-all -p stub-header-api start
scripts.start:headless:container: cross-env DEV_URL_OVERRIDE=http://localhost:3004 NODE_ENV=production ASSETS_PATH=/headerstatic REACT_APP_API_BASEURL=http://localhost:3020 npm-run-all -p stub-header-api container start
scripts.start:headless:container:local: cross-env USEDEVESI=1 DEV_URL_OVERRIDE=http://localhost:3004 NODE_ENV=production ASSETS_PATH=/headerstatic REACT_APP_API_BASEURL=http://localhost:3020 npm-run-all -p stub-header-api container start
scripts.start:headless:container:local:dev: cross-env REACT_APP_SERVE_PATH_PREFIX=/dev01 USEDEVESI=1 DEV_URL_OVERRIDE=http://localhost:3004 NODE_ENV=production ASSETS_PATH=/dev01/headerstatic REACT_APP_API_BASEURL=http://localhost:3020 npm-run-all -p stub-header-api container start
scripts.precommit: npm run tsc && npm run test -- --coverage && jest-coverage-ratchet && git add package.json && npm run build:local && npm run test:integration
